function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate evidence on the effect of green space qualities on mental health","Impact":"Risk of not accurately understanding the impact of green spaces on mental health","Mitigation":"Conduct more comprehensive research on the effect of green space on mental health","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for environmental and mental health research","People":"Public health researchers, environmental scientists, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Potential human health risks, such as zoonotic and vector-borne diseases, associated with enhancing biodiversity in urban areas","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission of contagious diseases in urban areas","Mitigation":"Implement measures for monitoring and mitigating zoonotic and vector-borne diseases","Technologies":"Disease surveillance systems, urban biodiversity management tools","People":"Urban residents, public health authorities, environmental organizations","Owner":"Public health agencies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Neglected intangible benefits of wildlife to humans","Impact":"Risk of overlooking the positive impacts of wildlife on human health","Mitigation":"Conduct research to understand and promote the benefits of wildlife to human health","Technologies":"Ecological monitoring tools, wildlife habitat preservation technologies","People":"Ecologists, public health researchers, wildlife conservation organizations","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, research institutions"}]}
